previewArticle.title: New York Red Bulls vs. Sporting Kansas City | MLS Cup Playoffs Match Preview

recapArticle.title: New York Red Bulls 2, Sporting Kansas City 1 | MLS Cup Playoffs Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The New York Red Bulls and Sporting Kansas City face off in the Eastern Conference knockout round for a chance to meet D.C. United in the next round.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: New York Red Bulls vs. Sporting Kansas City | October 30, 2014

timelineItems.desc: New York Red Bulls' supporters raise a massive tifo in honor of Bradley Wright-Phillips' big season.
timelineItems.title: TIFO: Red Bulls' fans pay tribute to Bradley Wright-Phillips' historic season

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Nick Chavez
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls have never won a playoff game at RBA. #MLSPlayoffs #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: Great noise from the South Ward so far despite a half empty stadium... definitely a playoff atmosphere #RBNY #NYvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Jamison Olave.

timelineItems.name: Lily
timelineItems.text: @NewYorkRedBulls #pregame #NYvSKC #RBNY http://t.co/1GkuUwNqkM

timelineItems.name: Andre Sherard
timelineItems.text: KC looks a whole lot more organized then last Sunday. for sure. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Howard Megdal
timelineItems.text: Two early Henry factors: spending a lot of time on defensive half of the field, and is clearly limiting his runs for preservation. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: Just a suggestion here. Graham Zusi might want to improve his service if SKC want to score off a set piece. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Ellis and Collin clearly flouting the ban on conga lines in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: Jordan Morris
timelineItems.text: Tim Cahill is the key man for #NYRB tonight, and I can see them sneaking this even though they've had a shaky start....

timelineItems.name: Derek
timelineItems.text: Dax dropping to LB, Miller pressing, Henry tucking in. I like it Petke #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Have a go, Thierry! #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Roger Deborde
timelineItems.text: #RBNY supporters' section: loud, proud, packed to the gills. The rest of RBA, "We have a soccer team? Neat." #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Red Bull Rant
timelineItems.text: It's one thing for Henry to drop back. It's another to drop back to the McCarty-Alexander line... #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Richard Jaffa
timelineItems.text: Poor start to the game with a lot of misplaced passes and no clear openings yet. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: CJ Sapong and Roy Miller having words. Something to keep an eye on? #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: This game is flying by. We're already in the 16th minute. I guess soccer heavens are in a rush to see LA Galaxy-Real Salt Lake. #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.comment: Roy Miller (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by C.J. Sapong (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: CAHILL SKIES IT FROM FOUR YARDS. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Make it six yards. Still. That’s the sort of miss that haunts a team. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Raque
timelineItems.text: Come on defense, you're better than that! Tim Cahill doesn't let those opportunities slip by that easily #SKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Safe to say that when Cahill went to play that ball, he got too far (puts on sunglasses) ... Down Under.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jorge Claros (Sporting Kansas City).
Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 19' McCarty looks to ignite a New York counter and Claros commits a foul. Free kick 40 yards from goal. 0-0 #NYvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, New York Red Bulls 2, Sporting Kansas City 1.

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Milagro en el Red Bull Arena. @NewYorkRedBulls remonta el partido y tumba al campeón: http://t.co/Ap6kuZXqiN #NYvSKC http://t.co/LBh2IugYVr

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Bradley WP, el milagroso. @NewYorkRedBulls remonta el partido y tumba al campeón: http://t.co/48Ph0GVLjE #NYvSKC http://t.co/FcuwzKN5ab

timelineItems.desc: The New York Red Bulls rally past Sporting Kansas City face in the Eastern Conference knockout round.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: New York Red Bulls vs. Sporting Kansas City | October 30, 2014

timelineItems.name: Red Bull Rant
timelineItems.text: #RBNY is getting more the possession now. Hopefully they can put in a goal or two.

timelineItems.comment: C.J. Sapong (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Roy Miller (New York Red Bulls).
Foul by Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Graham Zusi tries a through ball, but Aurélien Collin is caught offside.
Offside, New York Red Bulls. Thierry Henry tries a through ball, but Bradley Wright-Phillips is caught offside.
Ibrahim Sekagya (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Brandon M. James
timelineItems.text: It looks like SKC has never seen tight marking, which we all know they have. #SKC #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Offside flag goes up and denies SKC a potential goal. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Wright-Phillips finds the back of the net off a sublime ball from Henry, but it is negated by an offside call. On first look, he looked on.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).
Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Offside calls at both ends denied goals at both ends while I was in network hell. #RBNY #SKC

timelineItems.name: Chris George
timelineItems.text: Chippiness. We has some. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Blue Oyster Cult was right. Judging by what I just overheard on RBA fan mic, Joan Crawford *has* risen from the grave.

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: Henry's positioning has prevented #RBNY from adding width to the game on the left. That's making everything very predictable on the right.

timelineItems.comment: C.J. Sapong (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Roy Miller (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Jeremy Young
timelineItems.text: Benny Feilhaber looks like he might be offering mustache rides after the match #NYvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by C.J. Sapong (Sporting Kansas City).
Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Tip Top Tips
timelineItems.text: So far Cahill has missed a sitter and BWP has a goal ruled out. Hopefully they won't regret that. #NYRB

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Before that Wright-Phillips play, Sporting KC had an offside call disallow a goal they scored. 0-0 in the 27th minute. #RBNY #SKC #NYvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls).
Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
C.J. Sapong (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Ibrahim Sekagya (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) header from very close range is too high.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Bradley Wright-Phillips can't find the net with his header

timelineItems.name: MLS GB
timelineItems.text: Both sides struggling to control the game, giving the ball away too cheaply. Tempo will suit SKC. #MLSPlayoffs #NYvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Eric Alexander (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City).
Attempt missed. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) header from very close range is too high. Assisted by Lloyd Sam with a cross.
Delay in match Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Thierry Henry's shot goes wide of the far post

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Paulo Nagamura's (Sporting Kansas City) shot from the center of the box is saved by Luis Robles (New York Red Bulls).
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Luis Robles does well to stop Paulo Nagamura's first chance

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Bradley Wright-Phillips.
Attempt saved. Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Dominic Dwyer.
Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: THAT time, Henry draws the call. Free kick from 25 coming up. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Both sides, and #RBNY in particular, are building up decently well. But the execution inside the final third has been wanting. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Sekagya concedes a silly foul on the right flank. Not sure why he's even arguing it. He extended his arms on the play. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Peter Knox
timelineItems.text: Playoff @newyorkredbulls style. Go #rbny

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Dom is in beast mode tonight. Both sides of the ball. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: Henry is having a day with Ellis down the left flank... need to expose that more often #RBNY #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: NY knocking. Great cross from Henry only doesn’t get to BWP because Kronberg punches it away. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Upper 90 Soccer
timelineItems.text: Richard Eckersley hustle plays. More, please #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Ravita
timelineItems.text: That switch from Henry to Sam happened right in front of me. It was majestic. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Andre Sherard
timelineItems.text: Kronberg is going to eat those high looping crosses all day.. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Frankie
timelineItems.text: What a cross.. i see you Miller! #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Tonight’s “I’m going to miss Henry when he’s gone” moment came at 41:25 on the game clock. Just bossing poor Kevin Ellis. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Jamison Olave.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Sporting KC doing a good job of staying organized and disciplined and trying to hit on the counter. #SKC #NYvSKC #MLSCupPlayoffs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Thierry Henry.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the center of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Jamison Olave comes up with a huge block on Dom Dwyer's shot

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Aurélien Collin tries a through ball, but Dominic Dwyer is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: Zusi having trouble finding the range on his corner kicks? On average he's got it right - 1 too short, 1 too long #SKC #NYvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by C.J. Sapong.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Jamison Olave.

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: Olave enjoyed that first tackle, and got a crucial second. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: Olave pushed down, no call. Doles out his own justice with a meaty challenger to win the ball, slow #SKC attack. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: JS Bournival
timelineItems.text: Olave is a beast #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: Dicey moments for #RBNY as Robles is forced to play some sweeper keeper #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: MLS GB
timelineItems.text: Sporting Kansas City are growing into the game. Starting to open up for both sides as we approach halftime. #NYvSKC #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Red Bull Rant
timelineItems.text: Grab some popcorn at halftime, because we're in for a show in the 2nd half. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: HT. The deadlock stands. 45 - or maybe 75 more - to break it. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, New York Red Bulls 0, Sporting Kansas City 0.

timelineItems.name: Orri Ýrar Smárason
timelineItems.text: You just know that Olave & Sekaguy will make 2-3 big mistakes each game, the question is will they get away with it #RBNY #ShakyDudes

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Oportunidades para el uno, oportunidades para el otro. Falta el gol, muchachos: http://t.co/Pz4KbL9yvo #NYvSKC http://t.co/0bCgLMuxxy

timelineItems.name: Steve
timelineItems.text: Just some cold hooligans. #nyredbulls #nyrb #playoffs

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Oportunidades para el uno, oportunidades para el otro. ¡Falta el gol, muchachos! http://t.co/YfnPKURkP1 #NYvSKC http://t.co/bLsiv82gYw

timelineItems.name: Chris Hoenig
timelineItems.text: Daaaa Bulls. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Upper 90 Soccer
timelineItems.text: Any of you going as Olave for Halloween? We can't think of anyone scarier out there, to be honest #NYvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins New York Red Bulls 0, Sporting Kansas City 0.
Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Paulo Nagamura tries a through ball, but Dominic Dwyer is caught offside.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) header from the center of the box is close, but misses to the right following a set piece situation.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Dax McCarty misses an open net with his header

timelineItems.comment: Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by C.J. Sapong (Sporting Kansas City).
Attempt missed. Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Kronberg punches a ball to the top of the box where Dax is waiting, but his free header goes just wide. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: sυвaн ❂
timelineItems.text: Stop attacking king Henry! #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Gregg
timelineItems.text: Another missed chance for the Red Bulls! #RBNY

timelineItems.desc:
Take a look back at the best moments from the Knockout round games in MLS Cup playoffs past.

timelineItems.title: Top 5 - Playoff Knockout Round Moments | MLS Now

timelineItems.comment: Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls).
Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Shane
timelineItems.text: Could be 3-0 at this point. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Stephen Azierski

timelineItems.comment: Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jorge Claros (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Carlos Pereyra
timelineItems.text: Yup. That's so Metro. #metroforever #RBNY #NYvsCLE #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Peter Nolan
timelineItems.text: Action on Red Bull bench as subs begin to warm up. #MLSPlayoffs #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: James H
timelineItems.text: Maybe someone needs to wave a red cape behind the goal so the Red Bulls will aim for that #NYvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 0, Sporting Kansas City 1. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the center of the box.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Dom Dwyer gives Sporting KC the lead early in the second half

timelineItems.name: Capt Pluto
timelineItems.text: Come on #SKC make the Energy Drinks pay for their four best players missing goals.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: GOAL SKC! DWYER!

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) header from the center of the box is saved in the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Eric Kronberg makes a huge stop on Thierry Henry's header

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Dwyyyyyyyerrrrr. 1-0 @SportingKC. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Feilhaber with a perfect ball to thread the needle and Dwyer smashes it by Robles first time. 1-0 SKC. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Amy Worley
timelineItems.text: DOM the DESTROYER! #sportingkc #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Eric Alexander gets his pocket picked, Feilhaber springs Dwyer, and the narrative changes quickly. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Dwyer & Feilhaber have been @SportingKC's best players this season, so that's a pretty well-earned goal. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Roy Miller with a cross.
Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Eric Kronberg.
Attempt saved. Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Thierry Henry with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: HEADER, SAVED! Henry with a great header directed towards the top corner, but Kronberg soars to tip it over crossbar.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Incredible save! #NYvSKC https://t.co/zQV7TuEbZT

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: El camino a la gloria para @NewYorkRedBulls y @SportingKC. En EE.UU: @ESPNDeportes Latinoamérica: ESPNHD #NYvSKC http://t.co/tl5WHPvh2A

timelineItems.comment: Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Jimmy Conrad
timelineItems.text: Punishing teams for their mistakes. That's what defending champions do. #SKC #TakeTheCrownAgain

timelineItems.name: ljanerat1on
timelineItems.text: Mischief night. RBNY we run this! #runwithus #mls #knockout #RBNY #NYvsKC #dowhatyoulove #babeorites

timelineItems.name: Jim Aleski
timelineItems.text: This. #RBNY http://t.co/XORu9V5JHf

timelineItems.name: matt  caputo
timelineItems.text: Playoff pretzel. #newyorkredbulls #majorleaguesoccer #soccer #mls #mlscup2014 #mlsplayoffs #mlscup #nyredbulls #rbny #nyrb #redbullarena #newjersey #nj #futbol #calcio #redbulls

timelineItems.name: Kevin Fox
timelineItems.text: Henry and Cahill haven't played well together all year. Please dear god let them work well tonight. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: #SKC has labored recently, but as @ssinovic said this week, "That's all in the past now. It's a new season. It's the playoffs." #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Kyle Lock
timelineItems.text: Hey Red Bulls... where are all of your fans? Can't even imagine Sporting Park being that empty for an Open Cup match. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Anthony Bouts
timelineItems.text: Nothing cooler than going to #RedBullArena for #RBNY playoff game and running into friends and family sitting a few rows in front of you

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: It's go time. #NYvSKC https://t.co/OUV1gKP7iA

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Tonight's second tifo! #NYvSKC http://t.co/SxhGzaD7xy

timelineItems.name: paddyajones247
timelineItems.text: LET'S DO THIS RED BULLS! Win or go home! #rbny

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Eric Alexander (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the center of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Eric Alexander's shot goes wide after a crucial deflection

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Eric Alexander (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Lloyd Sam with a headed pass.
Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Matt Besler.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Inches. #NYvSKC https://t.co/mGQGPFDpJt

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Big sequence, but Alexander’s shot deflects out for a corner. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Red Bull Rant
timelineItems.text: #RBNY's passing has turned into a Keystone Cops routine all of a sudden.

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: El inglés Dom Dwyer abre la cuenta para la visita y anota su gol número 23 en el año: http://t.co/N4LfPnW9fu #NYvSKC http://t.co/TKsh3y8Sqe

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Eric Alexander (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Thierry Henry.

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: Atmosphere has improved since the goal. So has the game. #RBNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: Marios C Sfantos Esq
timelineItems.text: Cold night, excellent friends, battle of a game at Red Bull Arena! @NewYorkRedBulls go! #RBNY #RBNYvSKC #MLSPlayoffs http://t.co/Gqx6lVim6a

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: You miss a chance here, you miss a chance there. You miss a chance everywhere and shake it all about. Story of #RBNY's night. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Roy Miller.

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: #RBNY struggling to grasp possession early on... lots of defending so far #NYvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Thierry Henry with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Matt Kirschner
timelineItems.text: 58': #RBNY is knocking & knocking & knocking 2 inches to the right of the door. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Jimmy Nelson
timelineItems.text: I think Wright-Phillips was offside to begin with. Red Bulls putting a charge into their game now. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Wright
timelineItems.text: Okay. Lets get this defense thing figured out. #Sportingkc

timelineItems.desc:
Ahead of the MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T, knockout round matchup between New York Red Bulls and Sporting Kansas City, MLSsoccer.com's Katie Witham brings you 7 Things You Need to Know.

Which team will win this match? PLAY MLS CUP PICK'EM: http://bracket.mlssoccer.com/picks

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: 7 Things You Need to Know for NY vs. SKC | MLS Now

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: We may be watching the final 30 minutes of Thierry Henry #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: SKC playing with 2, 3, or 4 man pressure on RBNY’s back line to force a turnover. Home side struggling to get upfield. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Mandy Stark
timelineItems.text: Ellis is overmatched against Henry. Bring in Juliao. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: All but one Red Bulls stagnant, watching the action. The Red Bull warming up? Ambroise Oyongo. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls).
Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Kuba
timelineItems.text: Not a bad place to watch the game from. #RBNY #worklife

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Luyindula on for Alexander. Red Bulls searching for another spark in the attack. #RBNY #SKC #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Mandy Stark
timelineItems.text: Zero attack from the midfield right now. Dom can't do this by himself. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Ibrahim Sekagya tries a through ball, but Bradley Wright-Phillips is caught offside.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Jamison Olave.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Miller has been extremely physical in his duties on the left today. But clean. That is the way to do it. #RBNY #NYvKC

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: This is where Petke needs to improve, IMO. His team is struggling to find much of a dynamic edge & he still hasn't made another sub in 70th.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the center of the box is high and wide to the right.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Thierry Henry misses the target from close range

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Tim Cahill with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: And now it’s Henry’s turn to sky a perfectly good shot. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Jean Neuberger
timelineItems.text: Meanwhile, #SKC has only 29% of possession. They also have Dom Dwyer. 1-0 good guys with 20 mins to go.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: SKC nets another, but the ball crossed the line in the build-up and it’s a goal kick instead. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Mark Little
timelineItems.text: Dear lord!!! Please finish!!!!! #NYRB

timelineItems.name: Dome Pondering
timelineItems.text: Henry can't capitalize at all tonight. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by C.J. Sapong (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Andre Sherard
timelineItems.text: somebody needs to tell these Red Bull players how to cross.. whip the ball in. #MLSPlayoffs #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: C.J. Sapping has died. Or at least he’s acting like he needs last rites. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match C.J. Sapong (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 1, Sporting Kansas City 1. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the center of the box.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Bradley Wright-Phillips equalizes for the Red Bulls

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: GOAL NY! BWP! #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Esoterikos
timelineItems.text: It's a Christmas miracle #RBNY #MLS #MLSCup #MLSCupPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Nabae Asfar
timelineItems.text: RED BULLS EQUALIZE! Henry to Bradley Wright Phillips! Who else?! #RBNY #SKC #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.comment: Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Ambroise Oyongo Bitolo (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: WHO ELSE? BWP. 1-1. GAME ON. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: SlumdogThousandaire
timelineItems.text: LETS GO #RBNY http://t.co/ECv8P6mjxb

timelineItems.name: Barry Hott
timelineItems.text: Our team, our dream #rbny @newyorkredbulls (@ Red Bull Arena in Harrison, NJ) https://t.co/S6fokzYyfG http://t.co/vKgN0gk0Pg

timelineItems.desc: MLSsoccer.com's Andrew Wiebe previews the two starting lineups ahead of the Red Bulls clash with Sporting Kansas City.
timelineItems.title: WATCH: Starting XI breakdown & Crazy Stats | New York Red Bulls vs. Sporting Kansas City

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Henry with a perfectly weighted pass of his own. Perhaps that’ll end the “Henry doesn’t show up in the post-season” narrative? #NYvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Lloyd Sam tries a through ball, but Tim Cahill is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: James Bufton
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls deserve equaliser for their continued effort tonight, would prefer extra time but I can see hosts taking initiative now. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Lisa Richardson
timelineItems.text: The crowd is baying like wolves. #NYvKC #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).
Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Sapong leaves the match, and is still clutching his side. #SportingKC #NYvKC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Thierry Henry tries a through ball, but Roy Miller is caught offside.
Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: Attendance: 15,518 at RBA #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City).
Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: So it's not the pass of the century when Luyindula does it. Got it. #NYvKC #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: No player on the #RBNY roster can thread a pass quite like Luyindula. #NYvKC

timelineItems.name: klink84
timelineItems.text: No idea why we didn't win selfie of the game #runwithus #dowhatyoulove #shittiestrefsever #rbny #redbulls #playoffs #mls

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).
Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Stephen
timelineItems.text: Make up calls gonna make up call #rbny

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Como no podía ser de otra manera. Tití para BWP y PUM, el empate: http://t.co/Ah1F1vB1wk #NYvSKC http://t.co/0zpo1PsMjb

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Jacob Peterson.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 86' Henry swings in a corner and Dwyer is at the near post to head downfield. 1-1 #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Sandy Canetti
timelineItems.text: Got to say, Red Bulls deserved that equalizer #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Jared Coffman
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls with all the momentum right now #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Kevin Ellis.

timelineItems.name: Nick Chávez
timelineItems.text: High drama in Red Bull Arena. #RBNY #MLS #skcvsny

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 2, Sporting Kansas City 1. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) header from the center of the box.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Bradley Wright-Phillips stuns Sporting KC with the winner

timelineItems.name: Truman
timelineItems.text: Um, Cahill? Goal is the other way, buddy. #RBNY.

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: GOAL GWP!! COULD IT BE THE WINNER?? #RBNY #SKC

timelineItems.name: Danny Gibbons
timelineItems.text: OMG OMG OMG #NYRB

timelineItems.name: Vignesh Venkat
timelineItems.text: An accidental cross and an accidental goal. Nightmare for Kansas. #NYRB

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: This game's got more corners than Cthulhu's rec room.

timelineItems.name: Tomek Moczerniuk
timelineItems.text: Meanwhile in the possession department 72:28 #RBNY. If Sporting somehow wins tonight it will be a cheap way to go through. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Nicholas Weber
timelineItems.text: Back to back nights are you kidding me? KC is just getting their heart stomped on. #Royals #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: J.C. Dykes
timelineItems.text: Kronberg is absolutely awful... Literally the worst. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Four minutes of stoppage time. Petke going for some time wasting/fresh legs by inserting Lade. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).
Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Seth Sinovic.

timelineItems.name: Tim Donahoe
timelineItems.text: #RBNY #MLS #skcvsny 2 VERY soft weak shots score for NYRB on Swiss cheese Kronberg!

timelineItems.name: MLS GB
timelineItems.text: Peggy Luyindula has changed the game for New York. Inspired substitution #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: #RBNY add their mini-destroyer into the match. Connor Lade slots into the middle of midfield for Tim Cahill. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Jamison Olave.
Second Half ends, New York Red Bulls 2, Sporting Kansas City 1.

timelineItems.name: Stephanie
timelineItems.text: Wow, some tough times for Kansas City...Utterly heartbreaking. #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Alex Richards
timelineItems.text: Game over. #NYRB win 2-1. Thierry Henry lives to fight another day...thanks to Bradley Wright-Phillips.

timelineItems.name: Johnathan Saunders
timelineItems.text: The game was painful. Congrats to #NYRB on their victory. SKC did not play like champions tonight or the past few games.

timelineItems.name: Greg Sleter
timelineItems.text: Good for Mike Petke! He deserves this as much as anyone. #MLSPlayoffs #NYvSKC

timelineItems.name: Paul Kennedy
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls rally to win 2-1 for the first in playoffs at Red Bull Arena. Deserved victory. #NYvSKC
